alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 6:25PM EDT until July 18 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL HARRISON...SOUTH CENTRAL FLOYD AND WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 625 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Corydon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Shively, St. Dennis, Pleasure Ridge Par, Pleasure Ridge Park, Valley Station, Elizabeth, Bridgeport, Fishtown and Sugar Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
